The session covers architecture decisions, instance selection strategies, and practical solutions for common migration challenges including network latency and storage optimization.
abstract_cn: Apollo Tyres通过迁移到AWS高性能计算(HPC)改变了他们的工程工作流程。此举将仿真应用程序与设计工具集成，性能提升高达59%，成本降低超过60%。该公司使用AWS ParallelCluster构建基础设施，使用Amazon DCV实现无缝远程工作站访问，并使用FSx for ONTAP存储。他们的实施包括Tachyon平台用于自助作业管理，使工程师能够高效地提交和监控仿真作业。该会议涵盖架构决策、实例选择策略，以及常见迁移挑战的实用解决方案，包括网络延迟和存储优化。

presenter.name: Shailender Gupta
presenter.title: Global Head - Cloud Infra, Reporting, and Analytics

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimize gen AI apps with semantic caching in Amazon ElastiCache (DAT451)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ElastiCache 中的语义缓存优化生成式 AI 应用程序 (DAT451)
abstract: Multi-agent AI systems now orchestrate complex workflows requiring frequent foundation model calls. In this session, learn how you can reduce latencies to single-digit milliseconds from single-digit seconds with vector search for Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey in agentic AI applications using semantic caching, while also reducing the cost incurred from your foundation models for production workloads. By implementing semantic caching in agentic architectures like RAG-powered assistants and autonomous agents, customers can create performant and cost-effective production-scale agentic AI systems.
abstract_cn: 多智能体AI系统现在可以编排需要频繁调用基础模型的复杂工作流。在本次会议中，了解如何在智能体AI应用程序中使用Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey的向量搜索进行语义缓存，将延迟从数秒级降低到个位数毫秒级，同时还能降低生产工作负载中基础模型产生的成本。通过在RAG驱动的助手和自主智能体等智能体架构中实施语义缓存，客户可以创建高性能且具有成本效益的生产规模智能体AI系统。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale Trusted AI Adoption with Salesforce and AWS (AIM266)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Salesforce 和 AWS 扩展可信 AI 的采用 (AIM266)
abstract: Unlock powerful multi-agent workflows with Agentforce and AWS. Learn how to deploy Anthropic models on Amazon Bedrock to ensure compliant, secure AI adoption at enterprise scale. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 通过 Agentforce 和 AWS 解锁强大的多智能体工作流。了解如何在 Amazon Bedrock 上部署 Anthropic 模型，以确保企业级规模的合规、安全 AI 采用。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Salesforce 为您呈现。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Data modeling core concepts for Amazon DynamoDB (DAT311)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon DynamoDB 数据建模核心概念 (DAT311)
abstract: Join this session to learn the core concepts of Amazon DynamoDB data modeling. Explore best practices for common access patterns used by DynamoDB customers for applications that need consistent, fast performance at any scale. Developers experienced with DynamoDB can learn best practices and trade-offs to make when deciding on single-table and multi-table designs, indexing strategies, and more.
abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，学习 Amazon DynamoDB 数据建模的核心概念。探索 DynamoDB 客户常用访问模式的最佳实践，适用于需要在任何规模下实现一致、快速性能的应用程序。有 DynamoDB 经验的开发人员可以学习在决定单表和多表设计、索引策略等方面的最佳实践和权衡取舍。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Developer Experience Economics: Moving Past Productivity Metrics (DVT207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 开发者体验经济学：超越生产力指标 (DVT207)
abstract: Measuring the value of software development has challenged organizations for decades. This session shares insights to Amazon's approach of understanding the impact of developer experience and tooling. Learn how to apply these insights to your own team to go beyond lines of code and bring a more strategic level of thinking to your improvements to developer experience.
abstract_cn: 衡量软件开发的价值几十年来一直是组织面临的挑战。本次会议分享了亚马逊在理解开发者体验和工具影响方面的方法见解。了解如何将这些见解应用于您自己的团队，超越代码行数的局限，为改善开发者体验带来更具战略性的思维层次。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unifying AWS observability, logs, and traces with Dynatrace (AIM210)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Dynatrace 统一 AWS 可观测性、日志和追踪 (AIM210)
abstract: Learn how Dynatrace Grail® and Davis® AI provide a unified approach to logs, metrics, and traces across Amazon Web Services. Eliminate monitoring silos, gain real-time insights, and speed up root-cause analysis with expert strategies for streamlined observability and enhanced AWS operations. This presentation is brought to you by Dynatrace, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 了解 Dynatrace Grail® 和 Davis® AI 如何为 Amazon Web Services 提供统一的日志、指标和追踪方法。通过专家策略消除监控孤岛，获得实时洞察，加快根因分析，实现简化的可观测性并增强 AWS 运营。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Dynatrace 提供。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagine business intelligence with Amazon Quick Sight (BIZ228)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon QuickSight 重新构想商业智能 (BIZ228)
abstract: Enterprises are transforming with AI-powered BI from Quick Sight, turning scattered data into strategic action. Watch as we demonstrate how Quick Sight eliminates barriers to data-driven decision making using AI agents, allowing everyone to uncover critical insights and achieve better business outcomes. Hear from Intuit as they share how they transformed their analytics capabilities with Quick Sight—helping users perform advanced data analysis and analyze both structured and unstructured data using AI. Discover how Intuit is democratizing insights across their organization, analyzing massive high-velocity data sets efficiently, and achieving scalability, all without managing infrastructure.
abstract_cn: 企业正在通过 Quick Sight 的 AI 驱动型商业智能进行转型，将分散的数据转化为战略行动。观看我们演示 Quick Sight 如何使用 AI 代理消除数据驱动决策的障碍，让每个人都能发现关键洞察并实现更好的业务成果。聆听 Intuit 分享他们如何通过 Quick Sight 转变其分析能力——帮助用户执行高级数据分析，并使用 AI 分析结构化和非结构化数据。了解 Intuit 如何在整个组织中实现洞察民主化，高效分析海量高速数据集，并实现可扩展性，而无需管理基础设施。

presenter.name: NEAL CAULEY
presenter.title: WW GTM Leader Amazon Quick Suite

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximize the value of cold data with Amazon S3 Glacier storage classes (STG208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Amazon S3 Glacier 存储类最大化冷数据的价值 (STG208)
abstract: The data world has massive amounts of cold data, but with advanced analytics and increased demand for machine learning, it could be put to work at any time. In this session, learn how to use Amazon S3 Glacier storage classes to modernize your data archive and cost-effectively store long-term data without worrying about expensive tape drives or off-premises archival data. Discover the options for ingesting and restoring your data at petabyte scale while taking into consideration cost and retrieval performance.
abstract_cn: 数据世界拥有海量的冷数据，但随着高级分析和机器学习需求的增加，这些数据随时可能被投入使用。在本次会议中，了解如何使用 Amazon S3 Glacier 存储类来实现数据归档的现代化，并经济高效地存储长期数据，而无需担心昂贵的磁带驱动器或异地归档数据。探索在 PB 级规模下摄取和恢复数据的各种选项，同时兼顾成本和检索性能。

services: Amazon Simple Storage Service Glacier (Amazon S3 Glacier)

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building agentic AI platform engineering solutions with open source (OPN303)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用开源构建代理式AI平台工程解决方案 (OPN303)
abstract: Join us for this session as we share our vision for driving innovation through open source agentic AI, and enhancing work-life quality for platform engineers worldwide. We'll explore real-world examples of how platform teams can apply autonomous agentic AI to their organizations, integrating AWS services alongside other open source projects such as Kubernetes, ArgoCD, Backstage and more.
abstract_cn: 加入我们的会议，我们将分享通过开源代理式AI推动创新的愿景，并提升全球平台工程师的工作生活质量。我们将探讨平台团队如何将自主代理式AI应用于其组织的实际案例，将AWS服务与其他开源项目（如Kubernetes、ArgoCD、Backstage等）集成。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - CCC Intelligent Solutions gains better efficiency with Oracle to AWS PostgreSQL
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - CCC Intelligent Solutions 通过从 Oracle 迁移到 AWS PostgreSQL 获得更高效率
abstract: CCC Intelligent Solutions (CCC), a leading digital solutions provider for the insurance and automotive industries, successfully migrated their critical databases from Oracle to PostgreSQL, leveraging AWS RDS and Aurora PostgreSQL. This strategic move eliminated Perpetual Unlimited License Agreement (PULA) cost and generated additional savings on a monthly basis. The migration involved massive, highly transactional databases, with one critical database reaching 170TB in size. The 15-month project involved massive, highly transactional databases (more than 15 Oracle databases), including a critical 170TB database supporting 80% of their workloads. This presentation is brought to you by Cognizant, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: CCC Intelligent Solutions (CCC) 是保险和汽车行业领先的数字解决方案提供商,成功将其关键数据库从 Oracle 迁移到 PostgreSQL,利用 AWS RDS 和 Aurora PostgreSQL。此战略举措消除了永久无限许可协议 (PULA) 成本,并每月产生额外节省。该迁移涉及大规模、高事务性数据库,其中一个关键数据库达到 170TB。这个为期 15 个月的项目涉及大规模、高事务性数据库(超过 15 个 Oracle 数据库),包括一个支持 80% 工作负载的关键 170TB 数据库。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Cognizant 为您呈现。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Actionable controls for improving governance and compliance (COP347)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 改善治理和合规性的可操作控制措施 (COP347)
abstract: Organizations often struggle to translate complex regulatory requirements into practical controls while maintaining continuous compliance and security assurance. Learn how to transform compliance frameworks into actionable AWS controls through effective gap analysis and control mapping. This session shows how to leverage AWS Control Tower, AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, and AWS Audit Manager to build and maintain a scalable governance strategy. We'll explore real-world examples of mapping common controls across multiple frameworks, implementing automated compliance checks, and creating custom control deployments. Discover how to streamline compliance reporting while maintaining continuous security assurance across your AWS organization.
abstract_cn: 组织在将复杂的监管要求转化为实际控制措施的同时保持持续合规性和安全保障方面常常面临挑战。了解如何通过有效的差距分析和控制映射将合规框架转化为可操作的 AWS 控制措施。本课程展示如何利用 AWS Control Tower、AWS Security Hub、AWS Config 和 AWS Audit Manager 构建和维护可扩展的治理策略。我们将探讨跨多个框架映射通用控制措施、实施自动化合规检查以及创建自定义控制部署的实际案例。了解如何在整个 AWS 组织中简化合规报告的同时保持持续的安全保障。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 security and access control best practices (STG316)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 安全性和访问控制最佳实践 (STG316)
abstract: Building a robust data security strategy begins with choosing the right storage foundation. Amazon S3 provides security settings and granular access controls to suit any workload. In this session, learn about the fundamentals of S3 security and dive deep into the latest enhancements in usability and functionality. Explore options for access control, encryption, monitoring, auditing, and remediation. Discover best practices for data security and access control in S3.
abstract_cn: 构建强大的数据安全策略始于选择正确的存储基础。Amazon S3 提供安全设置和细粒度访问控制以适应任何工作负载。在本次会议中，了解 S3 安全的基础知识，并深入探讨可用性和功能方面的最新增强功能。探索访问控制、加密、监控、审计和修复的选项。了解 S3 中数据安全和访问控制的最佳实践。

services: Amazon Simple Storage Service Glacier (Amazon S3 Glacier)

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Colgate, Commonwealth Bank and Mondelez: Why chose AWS for SAP transformation
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高露洁、澳大利亚联邦银行和亿滋国际：为何选择AWS进行SAP转型
abstract: For decades, SAP has been the business process backbone for leading companies across nearly every industry; and thousands of customers trust AWS to run SAP.Many customers who are still running their SAP applications on-premises, and their impending SAP migration is part of a broader transformation they are undertaking – where SAP is a critical application, but just one of the components of something bigger. In this session, customers like Colagate, Commonwealth Bank of Australia, and Mondelez will share their transformation journeys including moving SAP applications on AWS, and  how they are partnering with Amazon to chart the future for their organization.
abstract_cn: 数十年来，SAP一直是几乎所有行业领先企业的业务流程支柱；成千上万的客户信任AWS来运行SAP。许多仍在本地运行SAP应用程序的客户，其即将进行的SAP迁移是他们正在进行的更广泛转型的一部分——SAP是关键应用程序，但只是更大规模转型的组成部分之一。在本次会议中，高露洁、澳大利亚联邦银行和亿滋等客户将分享他们的转型历程，包括将SAP应用程序迁移到AWS，以及他们如何与亚马逊合作为其组织规划未来。

presenter.name: Soulat Khan
presenter.title: WW Head of SAP Solution Architects

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Prudential’s microagent platform with MCP and A2A on AWS (IND3302)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在AWS上使用MCP和A2A构建Prudential的微代理平台 (IND3302)
abstract: Enterprises are exploring ways to scale their AI agent implementations beyond initial use cases. Learn how Prudential Financial is moving beyond single-purpose deployments with a scalable, microagent architecture powered by Amazon Bedrock and MCP agent-to-agent (A2A) communication. Prudential will share how their financial advisor assistant became the foundation for an enterprise multi-agent system, supporting diverse scenarios through modular design, independent scaling, and seamless deployment on AWS. Whether you’re exploring AI agents for specific business needs or building a foundation for enterprise-wide adoption, walk away with patterns and best practices for scaling AI agents.
abstract_cn: 企业正在探索如何将其AI代理实施扩展到初始用例之外。了解保德信金融如何通过由Amazon Bedrock和MCP代理到代理(A2A)通信驱动的可扩展微代理架构，超越单一用途部署。保德信将分享其财务顾问助手如何成为企业多代理系统的基础，通过模块化设计、独立扩展和在AWS上的无缝部署来支持多样化场景。无论您是在探索针对特定业务需求的AI代理，还是在构建企业级采用的基础，都可以获得扩展AI代理的模式和最佳实践。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deploy Quick Suite at scale with confidence and control (BIZ225)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模部署 Quick Suite，充满信心与掌控力 (BIZ225)
abstract: Learn how enterprise deployment strategies enable Quick Suite scale while maintaining security and operational excellence. Through a compelling customer story, discover how leading organizations have successfully deployed  AI agents, automation, and business intelligence capabilities of Quick Suite across global operations while meeting strict regulatory requirements. Explore identity management integration, access control patterns, and governance frameworks. Discover monitoring and audit strategies that ensure proper oversight while enable business agility across multi-account and cross-region deployments.
abstract_cn: 了解企业部署策略如何在保持安全性和卓越运营的同时实现 Quick Suite 的规模化。通过引人入胜的客户案例，探索领先组织如何在满足严格监管要求的同时，成功地在全球运营中部署 Quick Suite 的 AI 代理、自动化和商业智能能力。探索身份管理集成、访问控制模式和治理框架。了解监控和审计策略，这些策略可确保在多账户和跨区域部署中实现适当监督的同时支持业务敏捷性。

presenter.name: Emily Zhu
presenter.title: Sr. Product Manager, Amazon Quick Suite, AWS

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI in the Cloud: Surveillance, Sabotage, and Security (AIM242)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云中的人工智能：监控、破坏与安全 (AIM242)
abstract: Your AI-powered cloud is humming with activity, running advanced AI applications, but so are your adversaries. Last year we introduced the security for AI blueprint; now it is time to step into the role of operative. Hidden in the layers of data and code are covert risks, adversarial models, poisoned pipelines, and stealthy attacks. In this session, we will decode the enemy’s playbook and arm you with actionable intelligence to stay ahead. Learn how to expose blind spots, neutralize threats, and carry out your mission of keeping your AI-driven cloud secure, no matter how advanced the opposition becomes. This presentation is brought to you by Trend Micro, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 您的AI驱动云正在高效运行，执行着先进的AI应用程序，但您的对手也是如此。去年我们推出了AI安全蓝图；现在是时候扮演行动者的角色了。隐藏在数据和代码层中的是隐蔽风险、对抗性模型、被污染的管道以及隐秘攻击。在本次会议中，我们将解码敌人的策略手册，并为您提供可操作的情报以保持领先。了解如何暴露盲点、消除威胁，并执行您的任务——无论对手变得多么先进，都要确保AI驱动云的安全。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Trend Micro提供。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From EC2 to EKS: Tipalti’s transformation to Windows containers on AWS (MAM339)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从 EC2 到 EKS:Tipalti 在 AWS 上向 Windows 容器转型之路 (MAM339)
abstract: Is your Windows applications constrained by scaling limitations and complex operations? Discover how Tipalti transformed their traditional Windows application into a modern, containerized solution. Learn how to overcome process management challenges, implement auto-scaling, and achieve up to a 50% performance improvement. We'll walk through the implementation of Windows containers, logging solutions, and operational enhancements. Through Tipalti's transformation experience, key technical decisions, and lessons learned, you'll gain practical knowledge for modernizing your Windows applications.
abstract_cn: 您的 Windows 应用程序是否受到扩展限制和复杂操作的约束?了解 Tipalti 如何将其传统 Windows 应用程序转变为现代化的容器化解决方案。学习如何克服进程管理挑战、实现自动扩展并获得高达 50% 的性能提升。我们将详细介绍 Windows 容器的实现、日志记录解决方案和运营增强。通过 Tipalti 的转型经验、关键技术决策和经验教训,您将获得现代化 Windows 应用程序的实用知识。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customer Services Reinvention powered by AWS (AIM110)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 由 AWS 驱动的客户服务重塑 (AIM110)
abstract: At Grupo Werthein in Latin America, Accenture are reinventing Customer Service with Generative AI powered by AWS. Our transformation enables up to 90% resolution through digital channels, delivering humanized and personalized customer interactions. By operating a cost-efficient, scalable technology ecosystem across all transformed digital touchpoints, we ensure continuous improvement, smarter processes, and seamless experiences. This reinvention not only enhances customer satisfaction but also drives operational efficiency and business value. AWS empowers us to reimagine the future of customer care — intelligent, efficient, and customer-first. This presentation is brought to you by Accenture, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 在拉丁美洲的Grupo Werthein，埃森哲正在利用由AWS提供支持的生成式AI重塑客户服务。我们的转型通过数字渠道实现高达90%的问题解决率，提供人性化和个性化的客户互动。通过在所有转型的数字触点上运营具有成本效益、可扩展的技术生态系统，我们确保持续改进、更智能的流程和无缝的体验。这一重塑不仅提升了客户满意度，还推动了运营效率和业务价值。AWS使我们能够重新构想客户服务的未来——智能、高效且以客户为中心。本演示由AWS合作伙伴埃森哲为您呈现。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure in milliseconds: Visa's AI-powered fraud defense on AWS (IND3313)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 毫秒级安全防护：Visa 基于 AWS 的 AI 驱动欺诈防御系统 (IND3313)
abstract: Discover how Visa revolutionized real-time payment security by leveraging AWS services, including AWS Nitro Enclaves, Amazon EKS, and Amazon MemoryDB, for their Visa Protect solution. This session explores Visa's journey to a rapidly scalable, cloud-based fraud detection solution. Learn how Visa processes massive volumes of sensitive financial data with ultra-low latency while maintaining stringent security standards. We'll dive into the multi-region architecture, real-time AI/ML fraud detection on Amazon EKS, and compute-level isolation that allowed Visa to achieve sub-250 millisecond fraud detection latency and 99.99% availability. Join us to uncover the blueprint for secure, AI-driven payment risk scoring.
abstract_cn: 了解Visa如何利用AWS服务(包括AWS Nitro Enclaves、Amazon EKS和Amazon MemoryDB)彻底改变实时支付安全，打造其Visa Protect解决方案。本次会议探讨Visa向快速可扩展的云端欺诈检测解决方案转型的历程。了解Visa如何以超低延迟处理海量敏感金融数据，同时保持严格的安全标准。我们将深入探讨多区域架构、Amazon EKS上的实时AI/ML欺诈检测，以及使Visa实现低于250毫秒欺诈检测延迟和99.99%可用性的计算级隔离。加入我们，揭示安全、AI驱动的支付风险评分蓝图。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Netflix Connects Product Experiments to its AWS Bill (IND388)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Netflix 如何将产品实验与其 AWS 账单关联 (IND388)
abstract: How do you measure the cost of innovation? At Netflix, a "winning" A/B test can create hidden cloud infrastructure costs that offset its business value. This session details our strategy for connecting product experiments to their infrastructure costs. We'll share our framework for identifying an experiment's impact on our cloud systems and show how we translate that impact into a projected AWS cost. Learn how this enables our teams to make smarter, more cost-aware product decisions at scale.
abstract_cn: 如何衡量创新的成本？在Netflix，一个"成功的"A/B测试可能会产生隐藏的云基础设施成本，从而抵消其业务价值。本次会议详细介绍了我们将产品实验与其基础设施成本关联起来的策略。我们将分享用于识别实验对云系统影响的框架，并展示如何将这种影响转化为预测的AWS成本。了解这如何使我们的团队能够大规模地做出更明智、更具成本意识的产品决策。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build Advanced Search with Vector, Hybrid, and AI Techniques (ANT314)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用向量、混合和AI技术构建高级搜索 (ANT314)
abstract: Amazon OpenSearch Service is at the heart of how Artificial Intelligence is transforming the way we store, search, and use data. Learn how businesses are using AI to power their search-backed applications, achieving significant improvements in search accuracy and performance with OpenSearch Service’s advanced vector capabilities. Learn how Recruit uses OpenSearch Service to find available tables for "Hot Pepper Gourmet" diners. Dive deep into OpenSearch’s vector capabilities, and its role in building chat bots and agentic search. You’ll learn how to build scalable, high-performance, and cost-optimal solutions so that you can incorporate these technologies in your stack.
abstract_cn: Amazon OpenSearch Service 是人工智能转变我们存储、搜索和使用数据方式的核心。了解企业如何使用 AI 为其搜索支持的应用程序提供动力，通过 OpenSearch Service 的高级向量功能在搜索准确性和性能方面实现显著改进。了解 Recruit 如何使用 OpenSearch Service 为"Hot Pepper Gourmet"食客查找可用餐桌。深入探讨 OpenSearch 的向量功能及其在构建聊天机器人和代理搜索中的作用。您将学习如何构建可扩展、高性能且成本优化的解决方案，以便将这些技术融入您的技术栈中。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to AI strategy and implementation (SNR305)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者的AI战略与实施指南 (SNR305)
abstract: As generative and agentic AI transform business models, leaders must architect new operating models that bridge technology capabilities with business value. This advanced session reveals proven approaches for scaling AI from experiments to enterprise-wide value creation. Learn to shape AI-driven business strategies, design advanced decision systems, and build governance frameworks that accelerate adoption while managing risk. Leaders will leave with practical guidance to orchestrate AI capabilities and organizational transformation, execute their vision, drive innovation, and deliver quantifiable returns through scaled AI deployment.
abstract_cn: 随着生成式和代理式人工智能改变商业模式，领导者必须构建新的运营模式，以连接技术能力与业务价值。本高级会议揭示了将人工智能从实验扩展到企业级价值创造的成熟方法。学习如何塑造人工智能驱动的业务战略、设计高级决策系统，以及构建治理框架，在管理风险的同时加速采用。领导者将获得实用指导，以编排人工智能能力和组织转型、执行愿景、推动创新，并通过规模化人工智能部署实现可量化的回报。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Healthcare Transformed: Reimagining the Future with Generative AI (AIM241)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 医疗保健转型：用生成式人工智能重新构想未来 (AIM241)
abstract: Join a panel discussion hosted by PwC, featuring four Chief Information Officers from leading healthcare systems, as they explore the future of healthcare in a financially strained and rapidly evolving landscape. Discover how organizations are leveraging generative AI and secure, cloud-native platforms to boost productivity, reduce operational costs, and empower their clinical, operational, and research teams. Learn how to scale AI responsibly across complex enterprises, transform care delivery, and drive innovation with measurable outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 加入由普华永道主办的小组讨论，四位来自领先医疗系统的首席信息官将探讨在财务紧张和快速发展的环境中医疗保健的未来。了解各组织如何利用生成式人工智能和安全的云原生平台来提高生产力、降低运营成本并赋能其临床、运营和研究团队。学习如何在复杂企业中负责任地扩展人工智能、转变医疗服务提供方式并推动具有可衡量成果的创新。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道为您呈现。

presenter.name: Andy Crowder
presenter.title: SVP, Chief Digital and AI Officer

presenter.name: Geoffry Hook
presenter.title: Chief Information Officer - Part of Northwell Health

presenter.name: Rajesh Nair
presenter.title: CIO
presenter.company: WellSense Health Plan - Part of BMC

presenter.name: Michael Reagin
presenter.title: Executive Vice President, Chief Technology Officer

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond EHR: Leveraging AWS for Maximum Clinical and Operational Impact (IND213)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越电子健康记录：利用AWS实现最大临床和运营影响 (IND213)
abstract: Successful EHR hosting on AWS has become standard practice, as evidenced by AWS' 2025 Best in KLAS rating for public cloud. This session features two innovative health systems demonstrating how they've moved beyond basic EHR implementation to create competitive advantages with AWS. Leaders will share strategies for moving past "lift-and-shift" to drive meaningful innovation by leveraging cloud-native solutions, extending EHR functionality, and developing unique patient and provider experiences. Through real-world examples, attendees will learn practical approaches to healthcare innovation, value creation frameworks, and implementation insights. Designed for technology leaders, digital strategists, and clinical innovation teams seeking to differentiate their organizations.
abstract_cn: 在AWS上成功托管EHR已成为标准实践，AWS在2025年KLAS公有云评级中获得最佳评级即为证明。本次会议将展示两个创新型医疗系统如何超越基本的EHR实施，利用AWS创造竞争优势。领导者将分享超越"直接迁移"的策略，通过利用云原生解决方案、扩展EHR功能以及开发独特的患者和医疗服务提供者体验来推动有意义的创新。通过实际案例，与会者将学习医疗创新的实用方法、价值创造框架和实施见解。本会议专为寻求使其组织脱颖而出的技术领导者、数字战略师和临床创新团队设计。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming SAP with AWS AI services: AxFood and Harman’s AI journey (MAM214)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS AI服务转型SAP：AxFood和Harman的AI之旅 (MAM214)
abstract: As artificial intelligence (AI) continues to revolutionize enterprise operations, SAP customers like AxFood and Harman International are harnessing the power of AWS's cutting-edge  AI capabilities to revolutionize enterprise operations. This session explores the transformative potential of integrating AWS's AI innovations with SAP ecosystems to drive unprecedented levels of efficiency, creativity, and user engagement.
abstract_cn: 随着人工智能(AI)持续革新企业运营,像AxFood和Harman International这样的SAP客户正在利用AWS前沿的AI能力来革新企业运营。本次会议探讨了将AWS的AI创新与SAP生态系统集成的变革潜力,以推动效率、创造力和用户参与度达到前所未有的水平。

presenter.name: Erik Kamman
presenter.title: Head of WW Solution Architecture, SAP GTM

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a Secure Foundation for SAP RISE and Non-SAP Workload (NTA318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为 SAP RISE 和非 SAP 工作负载构建安全基础 (NTA318)
abstract: Discover how global enterprises successfully migrate SAP RISE and non-SAP workloads to AWS. This session explores the critical foundational aspects of AWS cloud migration, showcasing the implementation of a multi-account strategy that optimizes security and resource management.You'll learn how to build a secure landing zone, set up comprehensive backups, and establish integrated Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) capabilities.Learn how these key elements formed the backbone of AWS cloud migration, supporting both SAP and non-SAP ecosystems. You'll gain insights into overcoming challenges and implementing strategies that can accelerate AWS cloud adoption.
abstract_cn: 了解全球企业如何成功将SAP RISE和非SAP工作负载迁移到AWS。本次会议探讨AWS云迁移的关键基础方面，展示多账户策略的实施，以优化安全性和资源管理。您将学习如何构建安全的着陆区、设置全面的备份以及建立集成的安全信息和事件管理(SIEM)功能。了解这些关键要素如何构成AWS云迁移的支柱，支持SAP和非SAP生态系统。您将获得克服挑战和实施策略的见解，从而加速AWS云采用。

presenter.name: Syafili Lie
presenter.title: Head of Solutions Architecture, Canada Enterprise Greenfield

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Universal data connectivity with ETL and SQL queries (ANT209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 ETL 和 SQL 查询实现通用数据连接 (ANT209)
abstract: Learn how AWS can help you with data integration and preparing data for analytics, machine learning (ML) and generative AI workloads. Explore new capabilities that enable your users to have controlled access to all relevant data, easily build and maintain scalable and resilient data pipelines, and enhance decision-making quality,all with exceptional price performance. See how zero-ETL and query federation can complement ETL and ELT data pipelines.
abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何帮助您进行数据集成并为分析、机器学习 (ML) 和生成式 AI 工作负载准备数据。探索新功能，使您的用户能够对所有相关数据进行受控访问，轻松构建和维护可扩展且具有弹性的数据管道，并提高决策质量，同时实现卓越的性价比。了解零 ETL 和查询联合如何补充 ETL 和 ELT 数据管道。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 performance: Architecture, design, and optimization (STG335)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 性能：架构、设计与优化 (STG335)
abstract: Go behind the scenes of Amazon S3 performance architecture while learning practical optimization strategies. We'll explore how S3's internal systems manage massive throughput, handle concurrent requests, and balance loads across its distributed infrastructure. Dive deep into the technical foundations - from request routing and partitioning strategies to caching mechanisms - that enable S3 to power demanding workloads like real-time analytics and ML training. You'll learn how to leverage this architectural understanding to make informed storage class selections, implement performance-enhancing patterns, and design applications that maximize S3's capabilities.
abstract_cn: 深入了解 Amazon S3 性能架构的幕后机制，同时学习实用的优化策略。我们将探讨 S3 的内部系统如何管理海量吞吐量、处理并发请求以及在其分布式基础设施中平衡负载。深入研究技术基础——从请求路由和分区策略到缓存机制——这些技术使 S3 能够支持实时分析和机器学习训练等高要求工作负载。您将学习如何利用这种架构理解来做出明智的存储类选择、实施性能增强模式，并设计能够最大化发挥 S3 能力的应用程序。

presenter.name: Devabrat Kumar
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager Technical - External Services

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AgenticAI: Industry-Driven Architecture Excellence (NTA203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AgenticAI：行业驱动的架构卓越 (NTA203)
abstract: Discover how industry-specific requirements shape architectural patterns for effective Agentic AI implementations. This session explores how tailored architectural frameworks address unique challenges in healthcare, finance, manufacturing, and logistics. Through real-world use cases, learn the critical design considerations that drive innovation across sectors. Attendees will gain practical knowledge of implementation strategies that unlock Agentic AI's transformative potential, enabling them to apply these architectural patterns within their own industries.
abstract_cn: 探索行业特定需求如何塑造有效的智能体AI实施架构模式。本次会议探讨定制化架构框架如何应对医疗保健、金融、制造和物流领域的独特挑战。通过真实用例，了解推动各行业创新的关键设计考量。与会者将获得实施策略的实用知识，释放智能体AI的变革潜力，使他们能够在自己的行业中应用这些架构模式。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What Anthropic Learned Building AI Agents in 2025 (AIM277)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Anthropic 在 2025 年构建 AI 代理的经验教训 (AIM277)
abstract: 2025 was the year AI agents went from demos to production. In this session, we share what Anthropic discovered building Claude Code and working alongside customers deploying agents at scale throughout the year. We'll examine how AI engineering practices evolved, then dive deep into the patterns that keep agents reliable across hours of autonomous work: context engineering, skills, and our newest frontier model Opus 4.5. Finally, we'll look ahead at the trends we believe will define the next wave of agentic AI. This presentation is brought to you by Anthropic, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 2025年是AI代理从演示走向生产的一年。在本次会议中，我们将分享Anthropic在构建Claude Code以及与全年大规模部署代理的客户合作过程中的发现。我们将探讨AI工程实践如何演进，然后深入研究使代理在数小时自主工作中保持可靠的模式：上下文工程、技能以及我们最新的前沿模型Opus 4.5。最后，我们将展望我们认为将定义下一波代理AI的趋势。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Anthropic呈现。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Protect your data with AWS Backup: overview, use cases and what's new (STG207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Backup 保护您的数据：概述、使用案例和新功能 (STG207)
abstract: AWS Backup helps over 140,000 customers protect more than 2.9 exabytes of application data across AWS services. It offers policy-based data protection, streamlining backup management, enhancing security controls, and simplifying compliance reporting. In this session, you'll learn how to use AWS Backup, hear what's new, and discover practical implementation strategies. Plus, hear directly from customers about their real-world experiences using AWS Backup to protect mission-critical workloads and maintain business continuity. Whether you're new to AWS Backup or a seasoned user, this session will provide valuable insights into protecting your AWS environment.
abstract_cn: AWS Backup 帮助超过 140,000 名客户保护跨 AWS 服务的超过 2.9 艾字节的应用程序数据。它提供基于策略的数据保护，简化备份管理，增强安全控制，并简化合规性报告。在本次会议中，您将学习如何使用 AWS Backup，了解最新功能，并发现实用的实施策略。此外，您还将直接听取客户关于使用 AWS Backup 保护关键任务工作负载和维护业务连续性的实际经验。无论您是 AWS Backup 的新用户还是经验丰富的用户，本次会议都将为保护您的 AWS 环境提供宝贵的见解。

presenter.name: Rooshir Patel
presenter.title: Managing Director, General Manager - Data Protection & Recovery Product Line

presenter.name: Chuck Uwanna
presenter.title: Principal Application Architect - Strategy and Modernization

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Securing the AI Era: From Hype to Real-World Defense (AIM106)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 保护AI时代：从炒作到实际防御 (AIM106)
abstract: As organizations race to embrace AI, the question is no longer if AI will transform security and business operations, but how leaders can harness it responsibly and effectively. This session explores the latest attacker innovations powered by AI, and the defensive strategies security teams must adopt to stay ahead. You’ll gain insight into the real-world challenges enterprises face in managing AI risk, balancing productivity with protection, and ensuring trust in rapidly evolving systems. Through practical examples and forward-looking analysis, we’ll cut through the hype to reveal the tangible ways AI is reshaping cybersecurity and enterprise resilience. This presentation is brought to you by Zscaler, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 随着组织竞相拥抱人工智能，问题已不再是人工智能是否会改变安全和业务运营，而是领导者如何负责任且有效地利用它。本次会议探讨了由人工智能驱动的最新攻击者创新，以及安全团队必须采用的防御策略以保持领先。您将深入了解企业在管理人工智能风险、平衡生产力与保护以及确保快速发展系统中的信任方面所面临的实际挑战。通过实际案例和前瞻性分析，我们将拨开炒作迷雾，揭示人工智能重塑网络安全和企业韧性的切实方式。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Zscaler为您呈现。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernizing Global Payment Processing: Moving from Mainframe to AWS (SPS312)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代化全球支付处理：从大型机迁移到AWS (SPS312)
abstract: Learn how Global Payments is transforming its 40-year-old mainframe system into a modern AWS cloud platform. This major financial services company, which processes credit cards for over 600 million cardholders worldwide, is using enhanced support and monitoring tools to ensure a reliable transition to cloud-based processing.
abstract_cn: 了解Global Payments如何将其拥有40年历史的大型机系统转型为现代化的AWS云平台。这家大型金融服务公司为全球超过6亿持卡人处理信用卡业务，正在使用增强的支持和监控工具来确保可靠地过渡到基于云的处理系统。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Production Agent Swarms: Mastering Industrial AI (DEV311)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建生产级智能体集群：掌握工业AI (DEV311)
abstract: AI systems are evolving beyond multi-modal understanding into autonomous collaboration and problem-solving for industry-specific challenges. This technical session demonstrates how to build and orchestrate multi-agent systems that leverage industry expertise with LLMs. Topics include agent orchestration framework customization, advanced RAG patterns for domain knowledge, collaborative decision-making mechanisms, and production-scale observability. Drawing from real implementations, the session covers critical architecture decisions, common pitfalls, and proven solutions. Participants will gain practical patterns and code examples for building next-generation AI systems with memory, planning, and industry-specific collaboration capabilities.
abstract_cn: AI系统正在从多模态理解演进为针对行业特定挑战的自主协作和问题解决。本技术会议演示如何构建和编排利用行业专业知识与大语言模型的多智能体系统。主题包括智能体编排框架定制、用于领域知识的高级RAG模式、协作决策机制以及生产规模的可观测性。会议基于实际实施案例，涵盖关键架构决策、常见陷阱和经过验证的解决方案。参与者将获得用于构建具有记忆、规划和行业特定协作能力的下一代AI系统的实用模式和代码示例。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A complete guide to Amazon EVS: Unlock AWS scale for VMware workloads (MAM201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon EVS 完全指南：为 VMware 工作负载释放 AWS 规模能力 (MAM201)
abstract: Amazon Elastic VMware Service (Amazon EVS) is your fastest path to run VMware workloads on AWS, eliminating the need to replatform or refactor. Discover how Amazon EVS helps you unlock AWS scale and agility while maximizing existing VMware investments and skillsets. Explore core building blocks and guidance on self-managing or leveraging AWS Partners for your environments. We'll cover strategies for customizing your virtualization stack in the cloud, including integration with storage, backup, and disaster recovery solutions. Through a live demo, we'll showcase intuitive deployment workflows and share the latest service innovations to provide you with more choice and flexibility.
abstract_cn: Amazon Elastic VMware Service (Amazon EVS) 是您在 AWS 上运行 VMware 工作负载的最快路径,无需重新平台化或重构。了解 Amazon EVS 如何帮助您释放 AWS 的规模和敏捷性,同时最大化现有 VMware 投资和技能组合的价值。探索核心构建模块以及自我管理或利用 AWS 合作伙伴管理环境的指导。我们将介绍在云中自定义虚拟化堆栈的策略,包括与存储、备份和灾难恢复解决方案的集成。通过实时演示,我们将展示直观的部署工作流程,并分享最新的服务创新,为您提供更多选择和灵活性。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enabling AI innovation with Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio (ANT352)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio 实现 AI 创新 (ANT352)
abstract: Many enterprises want to build a culture of AI innovation and manage it at scale. Learn how a leading financial institution implemented a unified data and AI platform with built-in governance to solve this challenge. Using the next generation of Amazon SageMaker, their petabyte-scale solution enables users to discover and access data in a cloud-native marketplace then build  in a unified data and AI development environment. This session is ideal for data and platform leaders looking to balance self-service capabilities with robust governance to enable AI initiatives.
abstract_cn: 许多企业希望构建AI创新文化并进行规模化管理。了解一家领先的金融机构如何通过内置治理功能的统一数据和AI平台来解决这一挑战。利用新一代Amazon SageMaker，他们的PB级解决方案使用户能够在云原生市场中发现和访问数据，然后在统一的数据和AI开发环境中进行构建。本课程非常适合希望在强大治理与自助服务能力之间取得平衡以推动AI计划的数据和平台领导者。

presenter.name: Raghu Prabhu
presenter.title: Pr. WWSO GTM SageMaker Unified Studio

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Apache Kafka into a Scalable Message Queue (OPN413)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 将 Apache Kafka 转变为可扩展的消息队列 (OPN413)
abstract: Event streaming in Apache Kafka is powerful, but sometimes a queue-based model is more suited for workloads where parallel consumption is more important than ordering. KIP-932 introduces share groups, a feature that allows consumers to cooperatively consume data from Kafka topics, akin to how message queues work. This enables per-message acknowledgment, retries, and load distribution without the complexities of partition management. Ideal for independent work items, this approach simplifies message handling and enhances scalability. Join us to learn how KIP-932 brings queuing semantics to Kafka, enabling more flexible, efficient processing in event-driven architectures.
abstract_cn: Apache Kafka 中的事件流处理功能强大，但有时基于队列的模型更适合并行消费比顺序更重要的工作负载。KIP-932 引入了共享组功能，允许消费者协作地从 Kafka 主题消费数据，类似于消息队列的工作方式。这实现了按消息确认、重试和负载分配，而无需处理分区管理的复杂性。这种方法非常适合独立的工作项，简化了消息处理并增强了可扩展性。加入我们，了解 KIP-932 如何将队列语义引入 Kafka，在事件驱动架构中实现更灵活、高效的处理。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Future is Human: Intentional Innovation in the AI Era (WOC102)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 未来以人为本：AI时代的有意创新 (WOC102)
abstract: The pace of change in technology and the cloud demands human-centered leadership, grounded in intention and inclusion. Today’s leaders must deliver progress at speed while earning trust and creating cultures where both people and ideas can thrive in the future of work. This session brings together women driving transformation in the cloud to share how intentional leadership requires listening deeply, fostering confidence, and navigating uncertainty. Learn the priorities that drive meaningful impact and enable innovation in today’s rapidly evolving landscape. Moderated by Christina Mitine, Sr. Go-To-Market Lead. The panel will feature AWS Customers.
abstract_cn: 技术和云计算的变革步伐要求以人为本的领导力，植根于意图和包容性。当今的领导者必须快速推进进步，同时赢得信任并创造让人才和创意在未来工作中蓬勃发展的文化。本次会议汇集了推动云计算转型的女性领导者，分享有意图的领导力如何需要深入倾听、培养信心和驾驭不确定性。了解在当今快速演变的环境中推动有意义影响和促进创新的优先事项。由Christina Mitine（高级市场推广负责人）主持。小组成员将包括AWS客户。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Large-scale software deployments: Inside Amazon S3’s release pipeline (STG352)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模软件部署：深入了解 Amazon S3 的发布管道 (STG352)
abstract: Want to learn how Amazon S3, one of the world's largest distributed systems, manages software deployments at scale? This session reveals practical insights into our deployment tools, feature flag strategies, and progressive rollout techniques that enable reliable updates at massive scale. We'll share real-world lessons learned from critical deployments, including how we handle rollbacks, manage dependencies, and monitor service health during updates. Whether you're scaling your own deployment pipeline or interested in cloud infrastructure operations, you'll gain valuable strategies for building robust deployment processes that minimize risk while maximizing reliability.
abstract_cn: 想了解Amazon S3这个全球最大的分布式系统之一如何大规模管理软件部署吗？本次会议将揭示我们部署工具、特性开关策略和渐进式发布技术的实用见解，这些技术能够在大规模场景下实现可靠的更新。我们将分享关键部署中的实际经验教训，包括如何处理回滚、管理依赖关系以及在更新期间监控服务健康状况。无论您是在扩展自己的部署流水线，还是对云基础设施运营感兴趣，您都将获得宝贵的策略，用于构建稳健的部署流程，在最大化可靠性的同时最小化风险。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Measuring AI Impact with Amazon Q Developer and Jellyfish (DVT219)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Q Developer 和 Jellyfish 衡量 AI 影响 (DVT219)
abstract: Development leaders are struggling to show the impact of AI in software development. No single tool, such as Amazon Q Developer, can give the full picture. In this session hear from Genesys about their journey to measure the impact of AI and how the integration of Amazon Q Developer metrics into the Jellyfish platform gave them the visibility they needed. Attendees will learn about ways that AI Impacts software development, how the ingestion of Q Developer metrics into Jellyfish can shed light on those impacts over time and how a customer took that information and was able to tell the story of the impact of AI on their Development process.
abstract_cn: 开发领导者正在努力展示人工智能在软件开发中的影响。没有单一工具(例如 Amazon Q Developer)能够提供完整的全貌。在本次会议中,您将了解 Genesys 衡量人工智能影响的历程,以及将 Amazon Q Developer 指标集成到 Jellyfish 平台如何为他们提供所需的可见性。与会者将了解人工智能影响软件开发的方式、将 Q Developer 指标导入 Jellyfish 如何随时间推移揭示这些影响,以及客户如何利用这些信息讲述人工智能对其开发流程影响的故事。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Peak Performance: IoT Innovation in Professional Sports (SPF301)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 巅峰表现：职业体育中的物联网创新 (SPF301)
abstract: Discover how Catapult revolutionizes elite sports performance using AWS IoT technology. From the English Premier League to the NFL and NBA, learn how the world's leading teams leverage Catapult's cutting-edge wearable technology to capture millions of data points per athlete. This session reveals how Catapult architected their next-generation tracking system on AWS IoT, transforming raw biometric data into predictive insights that prevent injuries, optimize training loads, and maximize athlete performance. See how the combination of IoT, analytics, and AI/ML is reshaping the future of professional sports science.
abstract_cn: 了解Catapult如何利用AWS IoT技术彻底改变精英体育表现。从英超联赛到NFL和NBA，了解世界领先的球队如何利用Catapult的尖端可穿戴技术捕获每位运动员数百万个数据点。本次会议揭示了Catapult如何在AWS IoT上构建其下一代跟踪系统，将原始生物识别数据转化为预测性洞察，从而预防伤病、优化训练负荷并最大化运动员表现。了解物联网、分析和人工智能/机器学习的结合如何重塑专业运动科学的未来。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG Risk Intelligence: Accelerating World-Check with AI (GBL207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG风险智能：利用AI加速World-Check (GBL207)
abstract: LSEG’s Risk Intelligence business offers various solutions in the risk screening, digital identity and due diligence space to Financial Institutions. The Content Curation AI project is focused on improving data services which rely on manual processes to analyse and identify media coverage of individuals or companies engaged in risky behaviour. The goal is to automate, ingest and analyse information, alleviating tactical burden on staff and in doing so, free up human resources to focus on higher level value add contributions. Thus increasing LSEG's competitive advantage in the product marketplace. Programme running live in production and being run with AWS, LSEG and MeshAI.
abstract_cn: LSEG的风险情报业务为金融机构提供风险筛查、数字身份和尽职调查领域的各种解决方案。内容策展AI项目专注于改进依赖人工流程来分析和识别从事风险行为的个人或公司媒体报道的数据服务。该项目的目标是自动化、摄取和分析信息,减轻员工的战术负担,从而释放人力资源以专注于更高层次的增值贡献。这将提升LSEG在产品市场中的竞争优势。该项目目前在生产环境中运行,由AWS、LSEG和MeshAI共同运营。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond SFTP and NFS: Automate enterprise file transfers at scale (STG361)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越 SFTP 和 NFS：大规模自动化企业文件传输 (STG361)
abstract: Modern enterprises need flexible file transfer strategies addressing one-time migrations, recurring workflows, and processing-intensive transfers. This session explores comprehensive solutions using AWS Transfer Family and DataSync across these three scenarios. Learn to segment requirements and select appropriate services through real customer stories. We'll cover migration patterns for moving data from on-premises and other clouds, establishing secure recurring workflows, and integrating processing capabilities. Walk away with practical guidance on service selection, reference architectures, and best practices for building unified data movement strategies that scale with your business needs.
abstract_cn: 现代企业需要灵活的文件传输策略来应对一次性迁移、定期工作流和处理密集型传输。本次会议探讨使用 AWS Transfer Family 和 DataSync 在这三种场景下的综合解决方案。通过真实客户案例学习如何细分需求并选择合适的服务。我们将介绍从本地和其他云迁移数据的迁移模式、建立安全的定期工作流以及集成处理能力。您将获得关于服务选择、参考架构和构建可随业务需求扩展的统一数据移动策略的最佳实践的实用指导。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FIS: High-performance instant payment processing at massive scale (IND3318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FIS：大规模高性能即时支付处理 (IND3318)
abstract: New instant payment schemes like FedNow, TCH RTP, and crypto stablecoins promise unprecedented efficiency, affordability, and convenience, but they impose strict performance requirements, such as 99.99% uptime, high resiliency, and seamless integration with a wide variety of on-premises core banking platforms. Attendees of this session will learn how FIS built a cloud-native money-movement solution using services including Amazon EKS, Amazon Aurora, Amazon MSK, and Amazon CloudWatch to enable real-time interbank payments through a common unified API. We’ll explore how FIS’s solution achieves payments orchestration at massive scale while providing granular observability and centralized data persistence and processing.
abstract_cn: 像 FedNow、TCH RTP 和加密稳定币等新型即时支付方案承诺提供前所未有的效率、经济性和便利性，但它们也提出了严格的性能要求，例如 99.99% 的正常运行时间、高弹性以及与各种本地核心银行平台的无缝集成。本次会议的与会者将了解 FIS 如何使用 Amazon EKS、Amazon Aurora、Amazon MSK 和 Amazon CloudWatch 等服务构建云原生资金转移解决方案，通过统一的通用 API 实现实时银行间支付。我们将探讨 FIS 的解决方案如何在大规模实现支付编排的同时，提供精细的可观测性以及集中式数据持久化和处理。

services: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka (Amazon MSK)

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Make agents remember with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory (AIM331)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory 让代理具备记忆能力 (AIM331)
abstract: Intelligent agents with memory capabilities can deliver smarter, more personalized interactions—but implementing memory in production is no easy task. In this session, we’ll cover how to build context-aware agents using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory. Learn to manage short-term and long-term memory securely, structure agent interactions around user history, and scale memory. Hear from Experian on how they are reimagining conversational memory architecture across their AI ecosystem. Learn about their framework for hierarchical context and how the availability of AgentCore Memory is shaping their direction toward a simpler approach for future AI-driven products and services.
abstract_cn: 具有记忆能力的智能代理可以提供更智能、更个性化的交互——但在生产环境中实现记忆并非易事。在本次会议中，我们将介绍如何使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory 构建具有上下文感知能力的代理。学习如何安全地管理短期和长期记忆，围绕用户历史构建代理交互，以及扩展记忆功能。了解 Experian 如何在其 AI 生态系统中重新构想对话记忆架构。了解他们的分层上下文框架，以及 AgentCore Memory 的可用性如何引导他们朝着更简单的方法发展，以构建未来的 AI 驱动产品和服务。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Cathay Transformed DevSecOps with AI: A 75% Faster Security Story (SEC202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 国泰如何通过AI转型DevSecOps：安全效率提升75%的故事 (SEC202)
abstract: Learn how Cathay Pacific Airways  partnered with AWS ProServe to revolutionize their DevSecOps approach, moving  beyond basic security scanning to create a comprehensive shift-left  security-first culture. By implementing AI-powered security champions, defensive  coding patterns & anti-patterns, AppSec-as-Code libraries as knowledge  base, customized AppSec scanning rules and RAG-based Agentic AI assistant,  they achieved remarkable results: 50% cost reduction, 75% faster  vulnerability remediation, and 70% improvement in developer security  capabilities. Discover how this Fortune 500 airline transformed 1,000+  developers into security-conscious practitioners while managing 4,000+ annual  deployments.
abstract_cn: 了解国泰航空如何与AWS ProServe合作，彻底革新其DevSecOps方法，从基础安全扫描发展为全面的左移安全优先文化。通过实施AI驱动的安全冠军、防御性编码模式与反模式、AppSec即代码库作为知识库、定制化AppSec扫描规则以及基于RAG的智能体AI助手，他们取得了显著成果：成本降低50%，漏洞修复速度提升75%，开发人员安全能力提高70%。探索这家财富500强航空公司如何将1,000多名开发人员转变为具有安全意识的从业者，同时管理每年4,000多次部署。

presenter.name: Naresh Sharma
presenter.title: Head of IT Risk and Security

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating Development and DevSecOps with Amazon Bedrock and Kiro (PEX303)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock 和 Kiro 加速开发和 DevSecOps (PEX303)
abstract: Discover how AWS partners are leveraging Amazon Bedrock and Kiro to revolutionize both software architecture design and DevSecOps practices. Through real-world examples, explore powerful patterns that enhance the entire development lifecycle. Learn how to use GenAI to accelerate cloud architecture design processes—generating standardized patterns, optimizing configurations, ensuring compliance, and creating documentation. Explore how to integrate AI capabilities with security scanning tools, automated code generation, CI/CD pipelines, and threat modeling frameworks. This session showcases how AWS partners have implemented these solutions to improve consistency, maintain compliance, and automate security tasks. Bring your questions to this collaborative session.
abstract_cn: 探索AWS合作伙伴如何利用Amazon Bedrock和Kiro来革新软件架构设计和DevSecOps实践。通过真实案例，了解增强整个开发生命周期的强大模式。学习如何使用GenAI加速云架构设计流程——生成标准化模式、优化配置、确保合规性并创建文档。探索如何将AI能力与安全扫描工具、自动化代码生成、CI/CD管道和威胁建模框架集成。本次会议展示AWS合作伙伴如何实施这些解决方案以提高一致性、维护合规性并自动化安全任务。欢迎在这个协作会议中提出您的问题。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Put your data to work for Agentic AI with AWS storage (STG218)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用 AWS 存储让您的数据为智能体 AI 服务 (STG218)
abstract: Agentic AI systems require storage that delivers persistent memory, real-time decisions, and seamless multi-agent collaboration. AWS offers the most comprehensive storage portfolio to support these needs, including high-speed services like S3 Express One Zone, storage for compute intensive agent workflows using FSx for Lustre, and scalable vector storage and query with S3 Vectors. With the new MCP Server for S3, agents can query context-rich data using natural language without complex code. This session explores how to architect agentic AI with purpose-built AWS storage and integrations with Amazon Bedrock and OpenSearch Service, enabling intelligent agents to operate continuously while simplifying infrastructure and accelerating production deployment.
abstract_cn: 代理AI系统需要能够提供持久化内存、实时决策和无缝多代理协作的存储。AWS提供最全面的存储产品组合来支持这些需求，包括S3 Express One Zone等高速服务、使用FSx for Lustre支持计算密集型代理工作流的存储，以及使用S3 Vectors实现可扩展的向量存储和查询。通过新的MCP Server for S3，代理可以使用自然语言查询富含上下文的数据，无需复杂代码。本次会议探讨如何使用专门构建的AWS存储以及与Amazon Bedrock和OpenSearch Service的集成来架构代理AI，使智能代理能够持续运行，同时简化基础设施并加速生产部署。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack securely powers internal AI dev tools with Bedrock and Strands (AIM3309)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack 使用 Bedrock 和 Strands 安全地支持内部 AI 开发工具 (AIM3309)
abstract: Slack achieved 99% AI adoption by moving from experimentation to production-scale developer tools on Amazon Bedrock. Discover their journey deploying Claude Code and Cursor for accelerated development workflows, then building multi-agent systems with Strands Agents to automate escalation resolution at scale. Learn how Bedrock's Knowledge Bases and Guardrails enabled secure, governed AI deployment while custom MCP servers integrated internal tooling. Slack's approach combines developer acceleration with production agentic workflows, delivering measurable impact across PR throughput, code quality, and support automation. Walk away with practical patterns for scaling AI adoption in enterprise engineering organizations.
abstract_cn: Slack 通过将 Amazon Bedrock 上的开发者工具从实验阶段推进到生产规模，实现了 99% 的 AI 采用率。了解他们部署 Claude Code 和 Cursor 以加速开发工作流程的历程，然后使用 Strands Agents 构建多智能体系统，大规模自动化问题升级解决。了解 Bedrock 的知识库和护栏如何实现安全、受管控的 AI 部署，同时自定义 MCP 服务器集成内部工具。Slack 的方法将开发者加速与生产智能体工作流程相结合，在 PR 吞吐量、代码质量和支持自动化方面带来可衡量的影响。学习在企业工程组织中扩展 AI 采用的实用模式。

presenter.name: Mani Kaur
presenter.title: Head of GenAI GTMS, Strategic ISVs

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using graphs over your data lake to power generative AI applications (DAT447)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在数据湖上使用图技术为生成式AI应用提供支持 (DAT447)
abstract: In this session, learn about new Amazon Neptune capabilities for high-performance graph analytics and queries over data lakes to unlock the implicit and explicit relationships in your data, driving more accurate, trustworthy generative AI responses. We'll demonstrate building knowledge graphs from structured and unstructured data, combining graph algorithms (PageRank, Louvain clustering, path optimization) with semantic search, and executing Cypher queries on Parquet and Iceberg formats in Amazon S3. Through code samples and benchmarks, learn advanced architectures to use Neptune for multi-hop reasoning, entity linking, and context enrichment at scale. This session assumes familiarity with graph concepts and data lake architectures.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，了解 Amazon Neptune 在高性能图分析和数据湖查询方面的新功能，以解锁数据中的隐式和显式关系，从而提供更准确、更可信的生成式 AI 响应。我们将演示如何从结构化和非结构化数据构建知识图谱，将图算法（PageRank、Louvain 聚类、路径优化）与语义搜索相结合，并在 Amazon S3 中的 Parquet 和 Iceberg 格式上执行 Cypher 查询。通过代码示例和基准测试，学习使用 Neptune 进行多跳推理、实体链接和大规模上下文增强的高级架构。本次会议假定您熟悉图概念和数据湖架构。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From ideas to impact: Architecting with cloud best practices (ARC204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从创意到影响：基于云最佳实践的架构设计 (ARC204)
abstract: 2025 marks the 10-year anniversary of the AWS Well-Architected Framework, Cloud Adoption Framework, and AWS Cloud Operating Model. Learn how these foundational frameworks evolved through customer feedback and real-world learnings from thousands of organizations. What began as structured guidance has matured into dynamic insights for optimizing cloud environments. Discover how this continuous feedback drives innovation across architecture reviews, operations, and remediation. Learn practical strategies for applying these unified best practices to accelerate cloud transformation.
abstract_cn: 2025年标志着AWS Well-Architected Framework、Cloud Adoption Framework和AWS Cloud Operating Model十周年。了解这些基础框架如何通过客户反馈和数千家组织的实际经验不断演进。最初的结构化指导已经发展成为优化云环境的动态洞察。探索这种持续反馈如何推动架构审查、运营和修复方面的创新。学习应用这些统一最佳实践的实用策略，以加速云转型。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Volkswagen Group's custom GenAI models for global brand consistency (SPS313)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大众汽车集团的定制生成式AI模型用于全球品牌一致性 (SPS313)
abstract: Discover how Volkswagen Group, delivering 9.0 million vehicles annually across 115 global facilities, ensures brand consistency while scaling global marketing operations. Learn how VW transformed their marketing pipeline through two innovations: custom-finetuned image generation models creating on-brand visual content at scale, and pioneering work with Amazon Nova to automatically evaluate marketing assets against brand guidelines. As Nova's launch partner for customization, VW implemented preference tuning aligning AI with marketing experts' judgment. See how this intelligent system applies VW's unique brand standards across diverse markets, revolutionizing how a leading automaker maintains brand integrity while driving localized engagement.
abstract_cn: 了解大众汽车集团如何在全球115个生产基地每年交付900万辆汽车的同时，确保品牌一致性并扩展全球营销运营。了解大众汽车如何通过两项创新改变其营销流程：定制微调的图像生成模型大规模创建符合品牌的视觉内容，以及与Amazon Nova开展开创性合作，根据品牌指南自动评估营销资产。作为Nova定制化的首发合作伙伴，大众汽车实施了偏好调优，使AI与营销专家的判断保持一致。了解这一智能系统如何在不同市场应用大众汽车独特的品牌标准，彻底改变这家领先汽车制造商在推动本地化参与的同时保持品牌完整性的方式。

presenter.name: Sebastian Angersbach
presenter.title: Head of IT Service Strategy & Innovation

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - An unexpected journey building AWS MCP Servers (OPN401)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建 AWS MCP 服务器的意外之旅 (OPN401)
abstract: This session explores the evolution from generic AI coding assistants to AWS-intelligent development tools through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Attendees will learn how MCP transforms AI assistants by injecting AWS-specific context, best practices, and service knowledge directly into development workflows. We'll demonstrate using 25+ open-source AWS MCP servers that provide real-time access to CDK patterns, cost analysis, Amazon Bedrock capabilities, and infrastructure guidance. Through live demos and examples, you'll discover how to configure and leverage existing MCP servers that understand AWS services. Leave with practical skills to enhance your AI assistants for accelerated serverless and AI application development.
abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了从通用AI编码助手到AWS智能开发工具的演进过程，这一转变通过模型上下文协议（MCP）实现。与会者将学习MCP如何通过直接向开发工作流注入AWS特定上下文、最佳实践和服务知识来转变AI助手。我们将演示使用25+个开源AWS MCP服务器，这些服务器提供对CDK模式、成本分析、Amazon Bedrock功能和基础设施指导的实时访问。通过现场演示和示例，您将了解如何配置和利用理解AWS服务的现有MCP服务器。您将掌握实用技能，以增强AI助手，从而加速无服务器和AI应用程序开发。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Innovations in AWS analytics: Data processing (ANT305)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 分析创新：数据处理 (ANT305)
abstract: Launch your re:Invent 2025 experience at Monday evening's networking event. Exchange ideas with AWS experts, discover Partner innovations, and connect with fellow builders across the Expo floor. Enjoy complimentary refreshments and beverages throughout the space and at select sponsor booths. The Welcome Reception is sponsored by AMD.
abstract_cn: 在周一晚上的社交活动中开启您的 re:Invent 2025 体验。与 AWS 专家交流想法，探索合作伙伴的创新成果，并在展览大厅与其他构建者建立联系。在整个场地和指定赞助商展位享用免费茶点和饮料。欢迎酒会由 AMD 赞助。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Kinesis Data Streams under the hood (ANT423)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入了解 Amazon Kinesis Data Streams (ANT423)
abstract: Discover how AWS is changing data streaming with Amazon Kinesis Data Streams for infrastructure and operations. This session will explore recent innovations in how Kinesis Data Streams enables you to build robust, scalable data streaming applications that can handle millions of events per second. Join this session to see how you can leverage Amazon Kinesis Data Streams to build scalable, resilient data streaming applications for faster insights and improved decision-making.
abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何通过 Amazon Kinesis Data Streams 改变基础设施和运营的数据流处理。本次会议将探讨 Kinesis Data Streams 的最新创新，了解它如何帮助您构建强大、可扩展的数据流应用程序，能够每秒处理数百万个事件。加入本次会议，了解如何利用 Amazon Kinesis Data Streams 构建可扩展、具有弹性的数据流应用程序，以获得更快的洞察和改进决策制定。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale Security Operations with AWS Security Incident Response Service (SEC329)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 安全事件响应服务扩展安全运营 (SEC329)
abstract: Ready to modernise your incident response? Learn how Infor accelerated their security operations using AWS Security Incident Response service. Through Infor's implementation journey, learn how to automate investigation and remediation while maintaining consistency at scale. We'll cover service integration with Security Hub and GuardDuty, automated playbook execution, and cross-account coordination. SOC teams will learn practical strategies for implementing automated workflows for containment and forensics collection. Walk away with implementation patterns to reduce response times while maintaining audit controls across your AWS environment.
abstract_cn: 准备好实现事件响应现代化了吗？了解 Infor 如何使用 AWS Security Incident Response 服务加速其安全运营。通过 Infor 的实施历程，学习如何自动化调查和修复，同时保持大规模的一致性。我们将介绍该服务与 Security Hub 和 GuardDuty 的集成、自动化剧本执行以及跨账户协调。SOC 团队将学习实施自动化工作流程的实用策略，用于遏制和取证收集。您将掌握实施模式，以缩短响应时间，同时在整个 AWS 环境中维护审计控制。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Democratizing Whirlpool's Virtual Product Development with AWS (IND331)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 借助 AWS 实现惠而浦虚拟产品开发的民主化 (IND331)
abstract: Discover how Whirlpool leverages AWS to democratize Virtual Product Development and speed up design decisions. By running cloud-based cost and performance simulations, Whirlpool generates training data to build explainable machine learning models with Amazon SageMaker, deployed through a modular front-end on AWS Elastic Beanstalk. These tools empower enterprise-wide stakeholders to quickly explore trade-offs and perform multi-objective optimizations using Genetic Algorithms. This session highlights the journey from siloed tools to a unified cloud ecosystem, enabling faster, smarter product architecture choices and driving measurable improvements in cost, performance, and time-to-market.
abstract_cn: 了解惠而浦如何利用 AWS 实现虚拟产品开发的民主化并加速设计决策。通过运行基于云的成本和性能模拟，惠而浦生成训练数据，使用 Amazon SageMaker 构建可解释的机器学习模型，并通过 AWS Elastic Beanstalk 上的模块化前端进行部署。这些工具使企业范围内的利益相关者能够快速探索权衡方案，并使用遗传算法执行多目标优化。本次会议重点介绍了从孤立工具到统一云生态系统的转变历程，实现了更快、更智能的产品架构选择，并在成本、性能和上市时间方面取得了可衡量的改进。

presenter.name: Saurabh Bahl
presenter.title: Business Development Lead Manufacturing and Industrials

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Epic journey: Navigating the AI-powered SDLC from backlog to production(DVT208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 史诗之旅：从待办事项到生产环境的AI驱动软件开发生命周期导航(DVT208)
abstract: Developers, join an epic journey as we follow a humble backlog item through the winding path of the software development lifecycle from user story to deployment. Most developers spend less than an hour per day writing code. So why do focus so much attention on using AI to write code faster? In this session you will learn how Kiro CLI can help you with every stage of the SDLC.
abstract_cn: 开发者们，加入我们的史诗之旅，跟随一个普通的待办事项穿越软件开发生命周期的曲折路径，从用户故事到部署。大多数开发者每天花在编写代码上的时间不到一小时。那么为什么我们如此关注使用AI来更快地编写代码呢？在本次会议中，您将了解Kiro CLI如何在软件开发生命周期的每个阶段为您提供帮助。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Technical deep dive: Composable AI agents for partner solutions (MAM217)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 技术深度剖析：合作伙伴解决方案的可组合AI代理 (MAM217)
abstract: Accelerate enterprise modernization through agentic AI and composability. This innovation enables migration and modernization competency partners to build differentiated solutions by combining their specialized tools, industry knowledge bases, and custom agents with powerful capabilities. Through an intuitive chat-based interface, AWS partners can create customized transformation solutions that reflect their unique value propositions for specific industries and customers. Each transformation further enhances our AI agents' intelligence, continuously improving their ability to handle complex enterprise environments. Join us for a technical deep dive to learn how you can leverage agentic AI to build differentiated migration and modernization solutions.
abstract_cn: 通过智能体AI和可组合性加速企业现代化。这项创新使迁移和现代化能力合作伙伴能够通过将其专业工具、行业知识库和自定义智能体与强大功能相结合来构建差异化解决方案。通过直观的聊天界面,AWS合作伙伴可以创建定制化的转型解决方案,反映其针对特定行业和客户的独特价值主张。每次转型都会进一步增强我们AI智能体的智能,持续提升其处理复杂企业环境的能力。加入我们的技术深度探讨,了解如何利用智能体AI构建差异化的迁移和现代化解决方案。

presenter.name: Murtaza Chowdhury
presenter.title: Head of Product Management, Agentic AI, AWS

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building multi-tenant SaaS agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (SAS407)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 构建多租户 SaaS 代理 (SAS407)
abstract: The introduction of Amazon Bedrock AgentCore equips builders with a range of new tools and technologies. These tools enable a range of new strategies and techniques that will directly impact how teams build multi-tenant AI solutions and agents. This session will dig into working examples how tenancy is leveraged and landed in an intelligence-as-a-service environment,  highlighting the multi-tenant nuances and possibilities that can built with the latest AI-powered AWS services. This includes a deep dive AgentCore multi-tenant pattern, spanning the identity, memory, gateway, observability, and run-time elements of the AgentCore experience. The goal here is to understand how SaaS providers can introduce tenant-context into their agents to support core SaaS mechanisms and constructs (onboarding, isolation, data partitioning, identity, etc.).
abstract_cn: Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 的推出为构建者提供了一系列新的工具和技术。这些工具支持一系列新的策略和技术，将直接影响团队构建多租户 AI 解决方案和代理的方式。本次会议将深入探讨租户如何在智能即服务环境中被利用和落地的实际示例，重点介绍使用最新 AI 驱动的 AWS 服务可以构建的多租户细节和可能性。其中包括对 AgentCore 多租户模式的深入剖析，涵盖 AgentCore 体验的身份、内存、网关、可观测性和运行时元素。这里的目标是了解 SaaS 提供商如何将租户上下文引入其代理，以支持核心 SaaS 机制和构造（入职、隔离、数据分区、身份等）。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ditch your old SRE playbook: AI SRE for root cause in minutes (AIM260)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 抛弃旧的SRE手册：AI SRE在几分钟内找到根本原因 (AIM260)
abstract: When the pager goes off, engineers face a wall of noise: logs, metrics, traces, configs, code, and fractured tribal knowledge. Traditional observability adds data but rarely a path to resolution, leaving teams with heavy cognitive load and little context of the whole production system. In this session, see how AI SRE agents cut through the chaos by reasoning across every source, using tools like humans, testing hypotheses, surfacing evidence-backed root causes in minutes, and learning from every interaction. Learn what it takes to make multi-agent AI SRE production-ready, and how enterprises use Resolve AI to put machines on-call for humans. This presentation is brought to you by Resolve AI, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 当寻呼机响起时，工程师面对的是一堵噪音墙：日志、指标、追踪、配置、代码以及零散的部落知识。传统的可观测性增加了数据，但很少提供解决路径，导致团队承受沉重的认知负荷，对整个生产系统缺乏全局认知。在本次会议中，了解AI SRE代理如何通过跨所有数据源进行推理、像人类一样使用工具、测试假设、在几分钟内呈现有证据支持的根本原因，并从每次交互中学习，从而突破混乱局面。了解使多代理AI SRE达到生产就绪所需的条件，以及企业如何使用Resolve AI让机器为人类值守。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Resolve AI提供。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The incident is over: Now what? (COP216)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 事故已结束：接下来怎么办？(COP216)
abstract: Optimal operational practice defines how to handle inevitable incidents and recover quickly. What about the aftermath? How do we ensure that the true root cause is tracked down and that effective preventive actions are planned for implementation? How do we turn every incident into an organization-wide learning opportunity? How do the shared responsibility model and third-party software vendors come into play? We'll share our mental models and decades-long experience around Root Cause Analysis and Correction of Error (COE), so you can drive an effective practice in your own organization.
abstract_cn: 最佳运营实践定义了如何处理不可避免的事件并快速恢复。那么事后呢?我们如何确保追踪到真正的根本原因,并规划有效的预防措施以供实施?我们如何将每个事件转化为整个组织的学习机会?共同责任模型和第三方软件供应商如何发挥作用?我们将分享我们关于根本原因分析和错误纠正(COE)的思维模型和数十年的经验,以便您可以在自己的组织中推动有效的实践。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How AWS and Next Gen Stats Redefine Football Intelligence
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS与下一代统计数据如何重新定义橄榄球智能
abstract:
This isn't just sports analytics—it's a masterclass in operating ML and AI at unprecedented scale. In 2015, the NFL and AWS launched Next Gen Stats, transforming how millions experience football. What began with simple sport metrics has evolved into sophisticated machine learning capturing the game's complexity—completion probability, expected yards, pressure prediction, and coverage responsibility.

This session marks 10 years of innovation through Then → Now → Next. Then: basic stats gave fans new vocabulary. Now: advanced ML models reveal hidden dimensions, powering broadcasts, player safety, and experiences like Toy Story Funday Football. Next: AWS is architecting football's AI-first future with predictive and generative capabilities at NFL scale.

Discover how AWS processes billions of data points for real-time insights and explore ML breakthroughs behind probability engines.
abstract_cn:
这不仅仅是体育分析——这是在前所未有的规模下运营机器学习和人工智能的大师课。2015年，NFL和AWS推出了Next Gen Stats，改变了数百万人体验橄榄球的方式。从简单的运动指标开始，已经演变为捕捉比赛复杂性的复杂机器学习——完成概率、预期码数、压力预测和防守责任。

本次会议标志着10年的创新历程：过去→现在→未来。过去：基础统计数据为球迷提供了新的词汇。现在：先进的机器学习模型揭示了隐藏的维度，为广播、球员安全以及《玩具总动员趣味橄榄球日》等体验提供支持。未来：AWS正在以NFL规模构建橄榄球的AI优先未来，具备预测和生成能力。

了解AWS如何处理数十亿数据点以获得实时洞察，并探索概率引擎背后的机器学习突破。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Commonwealth Bank of Australia reimagines modernization via agentic AI (SPS310)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 澳大利亚联邦银行通过智能体AI重新构想现代化 (SPS310)
abstract: Commonwealth Bank of Australia (CBA) revolutionizes legacy modernization using AWS Bedrock's agentic AI architecture. Their groundbreaking solution slashes application assessment time from 6 weeks to under 1 hour and reduces overall modernization cycles from 16 weeks to just 1 week. Through specialized AI agents, CBA automatically analyzes legacy code, detects vulnerabilities, and orchestrates complex transformations while maintaining strict banking compliance. Multi-agent workflows handle security assessments, cloud readiness analysis, and automated network flow implementations, enabling transformation of monolithic systems into cloud-native applications with unprecedented speed and precision.
abstract_cn: 澳大利亚联邦银行（CBA）利用AWS Bedrock的代理式AI架构彻底革新了遗留系统现代化。他们的突破性解决方案将应用程序评估时间从6周缩短至1小时以内，并将整体现代化周期从16周减少到仅1周。通过专业化AI代理，CBA自动分析遗留代码、检测漏洞并编排复杂转换，同时保持严格的银行合规性。多代理工作流处理安全评估、云就绪性分析和自动化网络流实施，能够以前所未有的速度和精确度将单体系统转换为云原生应用程序。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Your Cloud Journey with AWS Transform (TNC208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS Transform 加速您的云之旅 (TNC208)
abstract: Embark on a faster, smoother cloud transformation with agentic AI and integrated solutions. This session reveals how AWS Transform accelerates your cloud journey, addressing migration and modernization challenges through intelligent automation. Through real-world examples, discover how to leverage this powerful integration to fast-track your cloud adoption and transformation efforts. With the specialized AI agents of AWS Transform, customers can migrate VMware workloads to Amazon EC2, modernize .NET applications to cross-platform .NET, and modernize IBM z/OS mainframe applications, delivering transformation projects up to 4x faster.
abstract_cn: 借助智能 AI 和集成解决方案，开启更快速、更顺畅的云转型之旅。本次会议揭示了 AWS Transform 如何通过智能自动化加速您的云之旅，应对迁移和现代化挑战。通过真实案例，了解如何利用这一强大的集成来快速推进您的云采用和转型工作。借助 AWS Transform 的专业 AI 代理，客户可以将 VMware 工作负载迁移到 Amazon EC2，将 .NET 应用程序现代化为跨平台 .NET，并对 IBM z/OS 大型机应用程序进行现代化改造，使转型项目的交付速度提升至多 4 倍。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining Business Processes with Joule Agents (AIM107)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Joule 代理重新构想业务流程 (AIM107)
abstract: See how enterprises are achieving measurable business results with generative AI solutions built on SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) and powered by AWS. Explore high-impact use cases—from optimizing supply chains and forecasting financial performance to strengthening operational resilience and deploying intelligent AI agents that work seamlessly across business processes. Discover how to combine trusted SAP data with AWS GenAI services and tap into the expertise of a broad partner ecosystem to accelerate solution development, reduce risk, and deliver greater business impact This presentation is brought to you by SAP, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 了解企业如何通过基于 SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) 构建并由 AWS 提供支持的生成式 AI 解决方案实现可衡量的业务成果。探索高影响力用例——从优化供应链和预测财务绩效到增强运营韧性以及部署能够跨业务流程无缝工作的智能 AI 代理。了解如何将可信的 SAP 数据与 AWS GenAI 服务相结合，并利用广泛的合作伙伴生态系统的专业知识来加速解决方案开发、降低风险并实现更大的业务影响。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 SAP 为您呈现。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Speed to Impact: AI Factory in the Cloud with NVIDIA on AWS (AIM116)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 快速实现影响力：基于AWS的NVIDIA云端AI工厂 (AIM116)
abstract: Developing and deploying mission-critical AI systems is increasingly complex and resource-intensive. This panel discussion demonstrates how organizations can accelerate AI development with turnkey, full-stack AI factories in the cloud—combining NVIDIA’s optimized hardware, software, and AI expertise with AWS’ scalable, co-engineered infrastructure. Attendees will hear customer success stories illustrating how this collaboration enables rapid, efficient delivery of advanced generative and Agentic AI applications by optimizing every infrastructure layer and leveraging best-in-class tools from both NVIDIA and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 开发和部署关键任务AI系统日益复杂且资源密集。本小组讨论展示了组织如何通过云端交钥匙式全栈AI工厂加速AI开发——结合NVIDIA优化的硬件、软件和AI专业知识与AWS可扩展的协同工程基础设施。与会者将听到客户成功案例，说明这种合作如何通过优化每个基础设施层并利用NVIDIA和AWS的一流工具，实现先进生成式AI和智能体AI应用的快速高效交付。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA提供。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Evaluating architectural trade-offs: Cloud patterns for flexibility (ARC321)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 评估架构权衡：云灵活性模式 (ARC321)
abstract: Transform traditional lock-in concerns into strategic architectural decisions using practical evaluation frameworks. Learn how organizations leverage proven analysis tools to assess switching costs against unique service capabilities. Explore patterns for determining when AWS-native services provide the best value versus when portability matters most. Through real-world examples, discover how to make pragmatic architectural choices that maximize business impact. Gain actionable strategies for balancing strategic flexibility with AWS-optimized patterns.
abstract_cn: 将传统的供应商锁定顾虑转化为战略性架构决策，使用实用的评估框架。了解组织如何利用经过验证的分析工具来评估切换成本与独特服务能力之间的权衡。探索用于确定何时AWS原生服务提供最佳价值以及何时可移植性最为重要的模式。通过真实案例，发现如何做出务实的架构选择以最大化业务影响。获得平衡战略灵活性与AWS优化模式的可行策略。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximize ROI: How Octus migrated CreditAI from Azure to Amazon Bedrock (SMB305)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最大化投资回报率:Octus 如何将 CreditAI 从 Azure 迁移到 Amazon Bedrock (SMB305)
abstract: This session reveals how Octus migrated CreditAI to Amazon Bedrock. We will detail Octus' journey from managing multiple cloud providers and costly GPU instances to implementing a streamlined architecture using Amazon Bedrock, AWS Fargate, and Amazon OpenSearch. Learn how Octus achieved zero downtime while reducing costs, improving scalability to handle millions of documents, and enhancing response quality. Discover practical strategies for consolidating AI operations and leveraging AWS to deliver powerful, conversational intelligence at enterprise scale.
abstract_cn: 本次会议展示了 Octus 如何将 CreditAI 迁移到 Amazon Bedrock。我们将详细介绍 Octus 从管理多个云服务提供商和昂贵的 GPU 实例，到使用 Amazon Bedrock、AWS Fargate 和 Amazon OpenSearch 实现精简架构的历程。了解 Octus 如何在实现零停机的同时降低成本、提升可扩展性以处理数百万份文档，并增强响应质量。探索整合 AI 运营的实用策略，以及如何利用 AWS 在企业规模上提供强大的对话式智能。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic Workflows: How Salesforce Manages 1000+ Clusters (OPN310)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理工作流：Salesforce 如何管理 1000+ 个集群 (OPN310)
abstract: As Kubernetes environments grow increasingly complex, platform teams struggle with the escalating challenges of managing multi-tenant clusters efficiently. This session presents a groundbreaking approach to Kubernetes operations, leveraging generative AI and multi-agent collaboration to create a self-healing, intelligent cluster management system. Drawing from real-world implementations, the session will demonstrate how Salesforce were able to manage and troubleshoot over 1,000 Kubernetes clusters using intelligent agents, dramatically reducing mean time to identify (MTTI) and mean time to resolve (MTTR).
abstract_cn: 随着 Kubernetes 环境日益复杂，平台团队在高效管理多租户集群方面面临着不断升级的挑战。本次会议展示了一种突破性的 Kubernetes 运维方法，利用生成式 AI 和多智能体协作来创建自愈的智能集群管理系统。会议将基于真实世界的实施案例，演示 Salesforce 如何使用智能代理管理和排查超过 1,000 个 Kubernetes 集群，显著降低平均识别时间 (MTTI) 和平均解决时间 (MTTR)。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build a Future-Ready SOC:Transform security logging with OCSF and generative AI
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建面向未来的SOC：利用OCSF和生成式AI转型安全日志
abstract: Learn how Merck revolutionized their central logging using Open Cybersecurity Schema Framework (OCSF) to achieve 48% labor efficiency gains and 47% infrastructure cost reduction. Discover how OCSF enables generative AI insights, reducing time-to-insight from full-day analysis to 30-minute solutions. Witness the power of OCSF using Agentic SOC AI Demo.
abstract_cn: 了解默克如何利用开放网络安全架构框架(OCSF)彻底改革其中央日志系统,实现48%的劳动效率提升和47%的基础设施成本降低。探索OCSF如何实现生成式AI洞察,将洞察时间从全天分析缩短至30分钟解决方案。通过Agentic SOC AI演示见证OCSF的强大功能。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zero Trust for Agentic Systems: Managing Non-Human Identities at Scale (SEC211)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理系统的零信任：大规模管理非人类身份 (SEC211)
abstract: Agentic systems—AI-driven applications that autonomously act across services—are transforming enterprise workflows, but they also create a surge in non-human identities (NHIs) and secrets that expand the attack surface. In this session, we’ll explore a vulnerable agentic application scenario to illustrate the risks of static credentials, permissive access, and leaked secrets. We’ll then demonstrate how HashiCorp Vault and HCP Vault Radar enable a zero-trust architecture that mitigates these threats while preserving developer agility. Attendees will leave with practical strategies to secure agentic systems from development to production on AWS. This presentation is brought to you by HashiCorp, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 代理系统——能够跨服务自主行动的AI驱动应用程序——正在改变企业工作流程，但它们也会导致非人类身份(NHI)和密钥激增，从而扩大攻击面。在本次会议中，我们将探讨一个易受攻击的代理应用程序场景，以说明静态凭证、宽松访问和泄露密钥的风险。然后，我们将演示HashiCorp Vault和HCP Vault Radar如何实现零信任架构，在保持开发人员敏捷性的同时缓解这些威胁。与会者将获得从开发到生产环境在AWS上保护代理系统的实用策略。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴HashiCorp提供。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build a well-architected foundation for scaling generative AI and agentic apps
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为扩展生成式AI和智能体应用构建架构完善的基础
abstract:
You've seen the potential of agentic AI through proof-of-concepts, and you're ready to build a foundation that can support all AI applications across your organization. Enter the complexities: model access and management, tool discovery, memory and state handling, observability, plus deployment and operations at scale!
In this session we'll demonstrate how to build a well-architected foundation that seamlessly integrates model access, orchestration workflows, agents, tools and domain-specific data pipelines while maintaining enterprise-grade observability and governance controls. We'll examine components of a production-ready generative AI and agentic system and dive deep into the architectural patterns that separates successful deployments from failed experiments.
abstract_cn:
您已经通过概念验证看到了智能体AI的潜力，现在准备构建一个能够支持组织内所有AI应用的基础架构。但随之而来的是各种复杂性：模型访问和管理、工具发现、内存和状态处理、可观测性，以及大规模部署和运维！

在本次会议中，我们将演示如何构建一个架构良好的基础架构，它能够无缝集成模型访问、编排工作流、智能体、工具和特定领域的数据管道，同时保持企业级的可观测性和治理控制。我们将研究生产就绪的生成式AI和智能体系统的各个组件，并深入探讨将成功部署与失败实验区分开来的架构模式。

presenter.name: Aamna Najmi
presenter.title: Senior Specialist Solutions Architect Generative AI

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unlocking business value by integrating SAP and non-SAP data sources (MAM213)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过集成SAP和非SAP数据源释放业务价值 (MAM213)
abstract: Leading enterprises are gaining competitive advantage by seamlessly integrating their SAP and non-SAP data assets to drive actionable insights. This expert panel explores how industry leaders created an innovation platform to maximize the value of their enterprise data. They will share their experiences, best practices, and practical approaches for building a cohesive data strategy that transforms enterprise data into strategic business value.
abstract_cn: 领先企业通过无缝整合其SAP和非SAP数据资产来驱动可操作的洞察，从而获得竞争优势。本专家小组探讨行业领导者如何创建创新平台以最大化其企业数据的价值。他们将分享其经验、最佳实践以及构建统一数据战略的实用方法，将企业数据转化为战略业务价值。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Multicloud security best practices (HMC318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 多云安全最佳实践 (HMC318)
abstract: Organizations operating in multicloud environments face challenges with distributed data security, identity management, and continuous monitoring. In this session, we will explore approaches to address multicloud security, aligned with NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF), an industry standard, focused on protect, detect, and respond functions. We will dive deep into security visibility via centralized logging, encryption and privacy enforcement, and centralized federation. You will learn specific architectural patterns that will help address multicloud security and identity challenges.
abstract_cn: 在多云环境中运营的组织面临着分布式数据安全、身份管理和持续监控方面的挑战。在本次会议中，我们将探讨解决多云安全的方法，这些方法与NIST网络安全框架(CSF)这一行业标准保持一致，重点关注保护、检测和响应功能。我们将深入探讨通过集中式日志记录实现的安全可见性、加密和隐私保护实施以及集中式联合身份验证。您将学习到有助于解决多云安全和身份挑战的具体架构模式。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build Enterprise AI Apps Faster: Amazon Bedrock's Multimodal Solutions -AIM3341
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 更快构建企业级AI应用：Amazon Bedrock的多模态解决方案 -AIM3341
abstract: Enterprise developers face challenges processing diverse unstructured content across multiple formats, often requiring complex integration of various AI services. Learn how Amazon Bedrock Data Automation simplifies AI application development by unifying workflows for documents, audio, images, and video into a single service. Through Air's success story discover how Bedrock Data Automation helps streamline content processing, optimizes price-performance, and enables customized insights generation. See how teams can accelerate their journey from experimentation to production while maintaining flexibility to use existing AI services where needed.
abstract_cn: 企业开发人员在处理多种格式的各类非结构化内容时面临挑战，通常需要复杂地集成各种AI服务。了解Amazon Bedrock Data Automation如何通过将文档、音频、图像和视频的工作流程统一到单一服务中，简化AI应用程序开发。通过Air的成功案例，探索Bedrock Data Automation如何帮助简化内容处理、优化性价比，并实现定制化洞察生成。了解团队如何在保持灵活性以便在需要时使用现有AI服务的同时，加速从实验到生产的旅程。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Breaking 25 years of tech debt using AWS Transform for .NET (MAM410)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Transform for .NET 打破 25 年的技术债务 (MAM410)
abstract: Discover how organizations are accelerating modernization of their legacy .NET Framework applications by up to 4x using AWS Transform. This session explores how Idemia, a leading identity solutions provider in the US, addressed 25 years of technical debt by using AWS Transform for modernizing their legacy .NET Framework applications to cross-platform .NET. We'll showcase AWS Transform's latest .NET features and share practical insights on maintaining business continuity during modernization of mission-critical applications.
abstract_cn: 了解组织如何使用 AWS Transform 将其旧版 .NET Framework 应用程序的现代化速度提升至多 4 倍。本次会议探讨了 Idemia（美国领先的身份解决方案提供商）如何通过使用 AWS Transform 将其旧版 .NET Framework 应用程序现代化为跨平台 .NET，从而解决 25 年的技术债务。我们将展示 AWS Transform 的最新 .NET 功能，并分享在关键任务应用程序现代化过程中保持业务连续性的实用见解。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Boomi Agentstudio- Govern Your AI Agents with Agent Control Tower (AIM103)
